title: 1 game. I afk'd 1 game because my internet goes out and I'm punished.
body: "Due to recent leaving and AFK behaviors on this account, you will be placed in a lower priority queue for 5 matchmade games". Now I'm assuming that means my queue times will be longer, thats ok. The problem is "behaviors" I afk a single game and suddenly I've been quitting all the time? I can appreciate you cracking down harder on afk's Riot, but your system definitely needs some work because I had no choice with my internet going out.
